lore: Known as the Beast of Calth, this unstoppable brute was first seen during the First Tyrannic War. Though many have thought it slain over the centuries, always the scarred monster rises again. Whether it is a Tyranid subgenus or the same unstoppable monster come again is a mystery few in its path live long enough to ponder.

meleeWeapons.name: Old one eye's claws and talons - strike
Old one eye's claws and talons - sweep

wargear.description: This model’s monstrous bonesword and lash whip can be replaced with one of the following:
This model’s monstrous scything talons can be replaced with one of the following:
appendix: *This model cannot be equipped with both a stranglethorn cannon and a heavy venom cannon. This model cannot be equipped with more than 1 heavy venom cannon, and it cannot be equipped with more than 1 stranglethorn cannon.

equipment: old one eye's claws and talons
